snippet.title: Word Trails | Official Game Trailer | Netflix
snippet.description:
Connect scrambled letters to create words that fit into a crossword-style puzzle. Solve daily challenges as you level up in this relaxing brain game.

Play Word Trails on your mobile devices. Available exclusively on Netflix: www.netflix.com/game/81665067

About Netflix:
Netflix is one of the world's leading entertainment services with over 247 million paid memberships in over 190 countries enjoying TV series, films and games across a wide variety of genres and languages. Members can play, pause and resume watching as much as they want, anytime, anywhere, and can change their plans at any time.

Word Trails | Official Game Trailer | Netflix
https://www.youtube.com/@Netflix
